ru.myx.ae3.report

Class Report

  • Object
    • ru.myx.ae3.AbstractSAPI
      • ru.myx.ae3.report.Report

  • public class Report
extends AbstractSAPI
    Author:
    barachta myx - barachta "typecomment": Window>Preferences>Java>Templates. To enable and disable the creation of type comments go to Window>Preferences>Java>Code Generation.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int LEVEL
      'ru.myx.ae3.properties.log.level' system property Indicates current reporting level - lesser level means lesser logging.
      static int LEVEL_DEBUG
      This level assumes that any messages should be passed as broadcast trough eventing system.
      static int LEVEL_DEVEL
      This level assumes that any messages should be passed as broadcast trough eventing system.
      static int LEVEL_MIN
      This level assumes that only WARNING, ERROR or application interchange messages should be passed as broadcast trough eventing system.
      static String LEVEL_NAME 
      static String[] LEVEL_NAMES 
      static int LEVEL_NORM
      This level assumes that only unknown, INFO, WARNING, ERROR or application interchange messages should be passed as broadcast trough eventing system.
      static java.io.File LOG_ROOT_FILE 
      static String LOG_ROOT_PATH 
      static String MAILTO
      'ru.myx.ae3.properties.report.mailto' system property email recipient to route system messages to if needs to be delivered
      static boolean MODE_ASSERT 
      static boolean MODE_DEBUG 
      static boolean MODE_DEVEL
